duties_responsibilities.duty: Take projects from conceptual stages through closeout, providing leadership and technical direction.
Assist with preconstruction, buying out contracts, and managing the project from start to finish.
Lead a successful project management team and ensure the quality and safety of the project.
Ability to walk a job site, climb ladders, and scale multi-floor scaffolding. Lift objects of at least 50 lbs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Construction Management, Engineering, Architecture, or related field (Master’s preferred)
